reviews.text:
Good Hotel. The rooms are very modern. There has clearly been put some work into it. The huge bathrooms were especially a highlight.

The rooms are very clean.

The personnel are super friendly and helpful.

The hotel is only about 2mins on foot away from the next tram station where you have good connection to the city centre and the train station. it's right next to the shopping strip. You get brands like Primark within walking distance.

Price is absolutely fine for the quality you get

The only negative point for me is that the staircase is very narrow. So if you have big luggage it can get a bit difficult. Unfortunately there is no lift.
The heavy smell of the bed leaves me sleepless this hotel is terrible.. I stayed here for one night with my wife and my son, baby, scandalous source of infection  ü§Æü§Æü§Æ
this hotel is a hotbed of infection, I spent one night there and couldn't sleep because of the smell and order of the bed and the pipes... I vomited ü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æ
Absolutely unique Art Deco / Jugendstil rooms. Very friendly staff. Absolutely worth a visit.
Really good experience. In the center of the city, near of everything. The room was excellent and the service too. Really recommend this pleaseü´∂üèº
